EmailTemplate.name: 08/10/2013 Secondary Photographs
EmailTemplate.subject: Secondary Photographs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
This Thursday 10th October we have a professional photographer visiting BSKL to take photographs of the Secondary campus.
For those students that have blazers we would very much appreciate if they could come to school that day wearing their blazer. It is not compulsory to purchase one should you not have one before this date.
Thank you as always for your cooperation.
Kind Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
